Sentencas: Fuel cells are electrochemical devices that convert the chemical energy of a fuel and an oxidizing agent into electricity, producing water as a byproduct.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for ammonia synthesis and energy conversion

Sentencas: This work demonstrates the use of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) to produce ammonia with cogeneration of electrical power.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for ammonia synthesis and energy conversion

Sentencas: Ammonia synthesis from an operating SOFC is achieved by supplying humidified air and fuel (hydrogen or methane).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for ammonia synthesis and energy conversion

Sentencas: The ammonia synthesis via the electrochemical promotion of catalysis (EPOC) becomes feasible with a zirconium oxide-based O2- conducting electrolyte (ScSZ).
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for ammonia synthesis and energy conversion

Sentencas: Significant improvement in the Faraday efficiency and electrical efficiency (? > 2) is observed in this system.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for ammonia synthesis and energy conversion

Sentencas: A high rate of ammonia production, 8.6 x 10(-9) mol cm(-2) s(-1), is attained when the cell operates with 14% humidified air and methane at 730 degrees C.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for ammonia synthesis and energy conversion

Sentencas: This ammonia synthesis approach could be competitive with the Haber-Bosch process.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cells for ammonia synthesis and energy conversion
